titles.title: A bill for the relief of June Feldman.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Federal Services, Post Office.

committee.subcommittee: Federal Services, Post Office, and Civil Service
committee.name: Senate Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Deems a specified period of service of a named individual with the Immigration and Naturalization Service to be service as a law enforcement officer for purposes of computing the survivor annuity payable to that individual's spouse.
